channel.title: Couldn't find Data Source as Oracle
channel.description:
Hi Support
I have setup AWS pre ami for use redash data source but oracle is not showing on data source could you please help me on same

item.title: Couldn't find Data Source as Oracle
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Hi there, what steps have you tried to debug so far? Did you check the forum for similar questions? Have you installed cx_oracle?
